TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaType extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnnotated

summary.span: 所有简单类型和复杂类型的基类。

span.span: The base class for all simple types and complex types.

remarks.format: ## Examples 请参阅类和有关使用此类的示例的类。See the class and the class for an example using this class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BaseSchemaType As Object
public: property System::Object ^ BaseSchemaType { System::Object ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This property has been deprecated. Please use BaseXmlSchemaType property that returns a strongly typed base schema type. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 获取编译后对象类型或内置 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 数据类型、simpleType 元素或 complexType 元素。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation object type or the built-in XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) data type, simpleType element, or complexType element.

summary.span: 这是一个后架构编译信息集属性。

span.span: This is a post-schema-compilation infoset property.

value.span: 内置 XSD 数据类型、simpleType 元素或 complexType 元素。

span.span: The built-in XSD data type, simpleType element, or complexType element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该复杂类型被派生自基值指定的类型。The complexType is derived from the type specified by the base value. 基础值必须是 QName。The base value must be a QName. > [!IMPORTANT] > 属性已过时，并已替换为属性。The property is obsolete and has been replaced by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BaseXmlSchemaType As XmlSchemaType
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaType ^ BaseXmlSchemaType { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此架构类型的基类型的编译后值。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation value for the base type of this schema type.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示此架构类型的基类型。

span.span: An object representing the base type of this schema type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性始终具有一个值，因为所有架构类型都具有基类型。The property always has a value, because all schema types have a base type. 在架构编译，使其架构编译信息集的一部分时设置此值。This value is set upon schema compilation, making it a part of the post-schema-compilation infoset.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Datatype As XmlSchemaDatatype
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDatatype ^ Datatype { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDatatype ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此复杂类型的数据类型的编译后值。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation value for the data type of the complex type.
The post-schema-compilation value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DerivedBy As XmlSchemaDerivationMethod

summary.span: 获取有关此元素如何从其基类型派生的编译后信息。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation information on how this element was derived from its base type.
One of the valid values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了此属性可包含的值。The following table shows the values that this property can contain. | 值 value|描述Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||指定任何派生方法。No derivation method specified.| ||通过替换派生。Derived by Substitution.| ||通过扩展派生。Derived by Extension.| ||通过限制派生。Derived by Restriction.| ||通过列表派生。Derived by List.| ||通过联合派生。Derived by Union.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod Final { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否允许进一步派生的类型派生的最终特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the final attribute of the type derivation that indicates if further derivations are allowed.
One of the valid values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示的值，此属性可以包含简单类型。The following table shows the values that this property can contain for simple type. | 值 value|描述Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||重写架构`blockDefault`设置，允许通过限制、 扩展或替换进行任何进行派生。Overrides the schema `blockDefault` setting allowing any derivations by restriction, extension, or substitution to take place.| ||不指定任何派生方法。No derivation method is specified. 这是默认设置。This is the default. 派生规则，将从架构 blockDefault 设置。Derivation rules are taken from the schema blockDefault setting.| ||不能被替换的替换派生的类型。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| ||无法替换通过扩展而派生的类型。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| ||无法替换为通过限制派生的类型。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| ||`#all`。`#all`. 无法替换由任何派生方法派生的类型。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by any derivation method.| 下表显示了此属性可包含复杂类型的值。The following table shows the values that this property can contain for complex type. | 值 value|描述Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||重写架构`blockDefault`设置，允许通过限制、 扩展或替换进行任何进行派生。Overrides the schema `blockDefault` setting allowing any derivations by restriction, extension, or substitution to take place.| ||不指定任何派生方法。No derivation method is specified. 这是默认设置。This is the default. 派生规则会从架构`blockDefault`设置。Derivation rules are taken from the schema `blockDefault` setting.| ||不能被替换的替换派生的类型。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| ||无法替换通过扩展而派生的类型。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| ||无法替换为通过限制派生的类型。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| ||`#all`。`#all`. 无法替换由任何派生方法派生的类型。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by any derivation method.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值指示如何的类型是受限制类型扩展通过限制时。This value indicates how the type is restricted when the type is extended through restriction. 如果类型标记为`final`，此类型不能进行扩展。If the type is marked as `final`, this type cannot be extended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你无法直接序列化的内置类型。You cannot directly serialize the built-in type. 如果需要序列化的类型，创建派生自的内置类型的新简单类型和序列化的简单类型。If you need to serialize the type, create a new simple type which derives from the built-in type and serialize the simple type. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建类型并将其添加到架构。The following example shows how to create the type and add it to the schema. summary.span: 获取或设置类型的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type.
The name of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML 命名空间规范中定义，名称必须是无冒号名称 (NCName)。The name must be an no-colon name (NCName) as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Namespaces specification. 如果指定，名称必须是唯一的而所有`simpleType`和`complexType`元素。If specified, the name must be unique among all `simpleType` and `complexType` elements.
